import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import Header from './Header'; import Main from './Main'; import Footer from './Footer'; import ImagePopup from "./ImagePopup"; import PopupWithForm from "./PopupWithForm"; function App() { const [selectedCard, setSelectedCard] = React.useState(null); function handleCardClick(card) { setSelectedCard(card); } function closeAllPopups() { setSelectedCard(false); } return (
); } export default App;
